author: Jason Wilson
comment: Latest update inaccurate. 6000 steps on the official google fit watch face. Nearly 10,000 with on11 (appart from that, it's awesome).

reply.author: Qian He
reply.content: Hi Jason. The difference is caused by the new Fitness API from Google, which reads step counts directly from the motion sensor on Android Wear devices. I saw many posts on Reddit mentioning about this bug, e.g. http://t.co/sT82PwOmxX http://t.co/75TkQLxxU1 . Pls wait Google to fix it. Meanwhile, send me an email if you want to know the details. :)

author: Ted Miller
comment: This warchface will guilt me into walking more, and I don't have to dig it out of my pocket.
title: Bye Fitbit?

author: Steve Smith
comment: After waiting a little while for it to install after the developer mentioned it it is a very nice app. Great colors and the steps is very good

reply.author: Qian He
reply.content: It will take one minute or two for your watch to install the watch face after installing it. This is caused by the limited bandwidth of Bluetooth communication and installation speed on Android Wear watches. Email me if it does not show up after 5 minutes. Thanks. qhe@wpi.edu

title: Very nice
